snippet.title: Instruments of Destruction - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Instruments of Destruction is a vehicle-building sandbox featuring physics-based destruction, coming to Steam Early Access on March 2nd, 2022.  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1428100/Instruments_of_Destruction/

Instruments of Destruction was created by Luke Schneider, lead technical designer of Red Faction Guerrilla.  Music by Auvic, vocals by Pipo Fernandez.

Instruments of Destruction Discord: https://discord.gg/C7A5CbUhb3
Development Roadmap (Trello): https://trello.com/b/M0tXkveV/roadmap

Radiangames on Twitter: twitter.com/radiangames
Email: luke@radiangames.com

[ Apologies if you see an ad before the trailer.  Channel isn't big enough to stop YouTube showing them yet. ]
